name.baseName: Cable manufacture ; a total of 67.2 km submarine cable.
电缆制造 ; 海底电缆总长67.2 km

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: This dataset represents the manufacture of submarine cables specifically designed for application in offshore wind farms, such as the Donghai Bridge Offshore Wind Farm (DBOWF) in China. The submarine cables, spanning a total length of 67.2 kilometers, are integral components for the transmission of electricity from the wind turbines to the power grid. They facilitate the critical connection between the wind turbines, located on each side of the Donghai bridge, and the energy infrastructure on land. Given the technical nature of these cables, they are specialized for underwater use to withstand the marine environment and maintain power transmission over long distances beneath the sea.
该数据集代表了为海上风电场专门设计的海底电缆的制造，例如中国东海大桥海上风电场（DBOWF）。海底电缆总长达67.2公里，是将风力发电机产生的电力输送到电网的关键组件。这些电缆在东海大桥两侧的风力发电机与陆上能源基础设施之间提供了至关重要的连接。鉴于这些电缆的技术特性，它们专门用于水下使用，以抵御海洋环境并在海底维持长距离的电力传输。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The functional unit is 1 kWh on-grid electricity provision.

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The studied wind farm, the Donghai Bridge Offshore Wind Farm (DBOWF), is China's first offshore wind farm within the jurisdiction of Shanghai, as well as the first offshore wind farm outside Europe. The project has two-phases of construction, located on each side of the Donghai bridge (Fig. 1).
所研究的风电场- -东海大桥海上风电场( DBOWF )是中国在上海管辖范围内的第一个海上风电场，也是欧洲以外的第一个海上风电场。工程分两期施工，分别位于东海大桥两侧(图1 )。

technology.technologicalApplicability: This dataset represents the manufacture of submarine cables specifically designed for application in offshore wind farms, such as the Donghai Bridge Offshore Wind Farm (DBOWF) in China. The submarine cables, spanning a total length of 67.2 kilometers, are integral components for the transmission of electricity from the wind turbines to the power grid. They facilitate the critical connection between the wind turbines, located on each side of the Donghai bridge, and the energy infrastructure on land. Given the technical nature of these cables, they are specialized for underwater use to withstand the marine environment and maintain power transmission over long distances beneath the sea.
该数据集代表了为海上风电场专门设计的海底电缆的制造，例如中国东海大桥海上风电场（DBOWF）。海底电缆总长达67.2公里，是将风力发电机产生的电力输送到电网的关键组件。这些电缆在东海大桥两侧的风力发电机与陆上能源基础设施之间提供了至关重要的连接。鉴于这些电缆的技术特性，它们专门用于水下使用，以抵御海洋环境并在海底维持长距离的电力传输。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: The present study employed the PLCA modeling approach to calculate the energy and environmental emissions of a typical offshore wind farm in China. The cradle-to-grave process includes four stages, materials and equipment manufacturing, transportation and installation, operation and maintenance, and dismantling and recycling (Fig. 2).
本研究采用PLCA建模方法计算了中国某典型海上风电场的能源和环境排放。从摇篮到坟墓的过程包括材料和设备制造、运输和安装、操作和维护、拆解和回收4个阶段(图2 )。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The technical parameters of wind turbines, foundations and cables are obtained from the design documents of the DBOWF (Table 2). The energy and emissions factors (i.e., the energy consumption and environmental emissions of per unit material and component production) are derived from the Ecoinvent 2.2 dataset (Ecoinvent Centre, 2009), and the coefficients of China's practices were preferentially referred. For key materials and equipment, their sea transportation energy is calculated from the transportation load and shipping energy intensity. The facility installation energy and emissions were estimated based on the construction plan. The wind farm's operation and maintenance data, such as the frequency and working time of maintenance, were obtained from site investigations with engineers and technicians. The uncertainties associated with model parameters and input data are illustrated in the sensitivity analysis section of this paper.

风机、基础和电缆的技术参数从DBOWF的设计文件中获得(表2)。能源和排放因子(即单位材料和构件生产的能源消耗和环境排放)来源于Ecoinvent 2.2数据集(生态发明中心, 2009)，优先参考中国实践的系数。对于关键材料和设备，其海上运输能量由运输负荷和海运能量强度计算得到。根据施工方案，对设施安装能耗和排放进行了估算。风电场的运行和维护数据，如维护的频率和工作时间，是通过与工程技术人员的现场调查获得的。与模型参数和输入数据相关的不确定性在本文的敏感性分析部分进行了说明。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Yang, J. et al. The life-cycle energy and environmental emissions of a typical offshore wind farm in China. Journal of Cleaner Production 180, 316–324 (2018).
Yang, J. et al. The life-cycle energy and environmental emissions of a typical offshore wind farm in China. Journal of Cleaner Production 180, 316–324 (2018).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users of this dataset should incorporate information related to the energy and emission factors provided by the Ecoinvent 2.2 dataset, with a focus on coefficients reflective of Chinese practices. The modeling approach and parameters from this dataset apply specifically to offshore wind farms and may not be appropriate for other types of marine construction or power transmission applications. Users must pay attention to the transportation load and shipping energy intensity when evaluating the sea transportation of materials and the subsequent environmental impact. Additionally, users should take into account the operational energy consumption and emissions data, informed by the actual operation and maintenance practices of the wind farm. The sensitivity analysis included as part of this dataset is critical for understanding the range of uncertainties in the model parameters and input data. When extending the application of this data, users should be cautions regarding the scope and the specific technological context of the DBOWF.

使用此数据集的用户应包含由Ecoinvent 2.2数据集提供的能源和排放因子的信息，并重点关注反映中国实践的系数。此数据集的建模方法和参数专门适用于海上风电场，可能不适合其他类型的海洋建设或电力传输应用。在评估材料的海上运输及其随后的环境影响时，用户必须注意运输负荷和海运能源强度。此外，用户应考虑实际风电场运行和维护实践提供的运营能耗和排放数据。作为此数据集一部分的敏感性分析对于理解模型参数和输入数据的不确定性范围至关重要。当将此数据推广应用时，用户应谨慎关于DBOWF的具体技术背景和范围。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
